InstructionData.Title: Mars Coolant Control
InstructionData.Description: Take coolant from stock tank, dump heated coolent to be filteredâ€‹
InstructionData.Author: Renrek
InstructionData.Instructions:
define TOKELVIN 273.15 define PRESSURE 2000
alias analyzer d0 alias dumpPump d1 alias intakePump d2 alias dial d3
alias coolantTemp r0 alias coolantPressure r1 alias dumpTemp r2 alias dumpStatus r3 alias intakeStatus r4
main: jal checkSensors sge dumpStatus coolantTemp dumpTemp s dumpPump On dumpStatus slt intakeStatus coolantPressure PRESSURE s intakePump On intakeStatus j main
checkSensors: l coolantPressure analyzer Pressure l coolantTemp analyzer Temperature l dumpTemp dial Setting add dumpTemp dumpTemp TOKELVIN j ra
